author: Omkar Godbole
title: Short COIN/Long BTC Trade Will Be a Winner as Soaring Coinbase Nears Overvaluation: 10x Research
description: Shares in Coinbase are nearing an overvaluation threshold, prompting 10x to recommend a short position in COIN and a long position in bitcoin.
content: Shares in Nasdaq-listed cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase (COIN) are fast approaching an overvaluation threshold, 10x Research, headed by Markus Thielen, said Friday. Thielen is recommending a pair tr… [+2110 chars]
